description:
A Modern Chess Database


See the assets to download and install this version.What's Changed
- Support for folders in the files page
- Improved database management: add or delete games, merge players, detect duplicate games.
- More database search options
- Allow changing the default location of saved games
- Add option to hide current puzzle rating by @spinward in #190
- Add setting for board move scrolling by @anderslundback in #210
- Rework opening practice by @franciscoBSalgueiro in #238
- Kill engine button by @tblrone in #234
- Added ability to take back moves when playing against engine by @Cankyre in #245
- Added ability to cycle between brilliancies/mistakes/blunders in the review tab by @Cankyre in #247
- Bug fixes
